title: Portfolio website
description: First web appplication developpement using React JS and Vite

title: Battery Management System controlled by an embedded system
location: Senior year project in collaboration with Rheolution Inc.
description: Developpement of a power supply module and charging management system for a Lithium-ion battery controlled by an embedded system. I worked on the electrical circuits designs as well as the Matlab/Simulink simulations of the state of charge.

title: STM32 Dino game
location: Project done within the course ELE3312 - Microcontrollers and appplications
description: Chrome Dinosaur game running on a STM32 microcontroller that plays through ultrasonic sensors while including a multiplayer mode.

title: Touchless automatic sensor garbage bin with telecommunications features
description: Garbage bin with automatic opening through voice or hand detection that measures the amount of waste inside it and sends an SMS whenever it's full.
